name: Dino Destroyer City hunter
description:
Dino Grand City Simulator

Check our new game Dino grand city Simulator Free available in Casual category on in this game not a dino shooter.dino shooter is shooting a man.but in this game dino shoot a man because deadly dino is harassment a city.Download now and Go back to destroy the modern city and many more exciting locations to hunt.A new challenging game of Dino Hunting, smash down the cities in this advanced dinosaur simulator.
You no longer have to fantasize about being a dinosaur; your dreams have finally come true! Rediscover the lost world of the dinosaurs, take control of the dinosaurs and rampage the city.

While playing this amazing Dino Hunting simulator game, you will be put through various deadly challenges and objectives.
Complete the tasks and destroy the city in this action packed Dinosaur simulator game.

key features:

3D and Realistic Environments
Realistic HD Graphics
Free Casual Game
Realistic game play and cool sound
Ultimate Hunting Adventure.
Challenging time limit
Free app for everyone
